metadata.title: AGiA | #dirittiincrescita
metadata.description: “Diritti in crescita” is an integrated campaign created for the Presidency of the Council of Ministers \ and the Guarantor Authority for Children and Adolescents (’Autorità Garante per l’Infanzia e l’Adolescenza)  on children's rights for the UN anniversary.

title: AGiA | Diritti in crescita
credits:
**Direction:** Giulia Castiello

**Producer:** Francesca Orsi



**Illustration/Animation:** Matteo Franco, Serena Paratore
description:
“Diritti in crescita” is an integrated campaign created for the Presidency of the Council of Ministers \
and the Guarantor Authority for Children and Adolescents (Autorità Garante per l’Infanzia e l’Adolescenza) on children's rights for the UN anniversary.
